user.name: Eliezer Yudkowsky ‚èπÔ∏è
user.description: The original AI alignment person.  Missing punctuation at the end of a sentence means it's humor.  If you're not sure, it's also very likely humor.

fullText: If you go to AIs for emotional advice, they will drive you insane if you are vulnerable.  If you ask AIs to teach you facts and you check their references, you can, for now, learn pretty fast!  A good use of modern AIs is tutoring -- if you know the tutor sometimes lies.

fullText: starting to see ai ventures in terms of capital "scaling laws". LLMs take logarithmic investment for linear returns (ie: 10x investment = increases revenue by 2x), but some field (like robotics) are linear! 10 robots make 10x more revenue and cost < 10x due to factory scaling!
